definitions.definition: The act of cleaning by dusting.
The earth, as the resting place of the dead.
The earthy remains of bodies once alive; the remains of the human body.
Cash; money (in reference to gold dust).

definitions.example: to raise, or kick up, a dust

definitions.definition: A totally disconnected set of points with a fractal structure.

definitions.example: The cleaning lady needs a stool to dust the cupboard.

definitions.definition: To remove dust; to clean by removing dust.
Of a bird, to cover itself in sand or dry, dusty earth.
To spray or cover something with fine powder or liquid.
definitions.example: The mother dusted her baby's bum with talcum powder.

definitions.definition: To reduce to a fine powder; to levigate.
